DOC.brief_summary: Three group 8 Japanese male give single ascend dos ASP1707 placebo ass safety tolerability , evaluate absorb , metabolize distribute body .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effects Single Ascending Doses ASP1707 Healthy Young Japanese Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: The first group receive low dose last group receive high dose . ASP1707 match placebo administer single dose fast condition . Screening take place Day -22 Day -2 . Subjects admit clinic Day -1 remain Day 5 . An end study visit ( ESV ) take place 7-14 day discharge . Escalation next high dose take place review safety tolerability data previous dose . Safety assessment perform throughout study . Plasma urine sample collect pharmacokinetics ( PK ) analysis . Serum sample collect pharmacodynamic ( PD ) analysis .
DOC.criteria: Born Japan Both parent Japanese descent Time reside outside Japan exceed 5 year Maintains Japanese life style include diet Male subject must nonfertile , i.e . surgically sterilize must practice effective contraceptive method Subjects outofrange T level serum screen Subjects history cancer
